title: The New librarians
creator_credit: Michael Bloebaum, Henri Bagdadi and Universal Education and Visual Arts
brief_description: A panoramic view of the exciting changes occurring in schools, public and business libraries. Shows the importance of a library to the population it serves. The new librarians are reaching out to the public via mobile units, jazz sessions, video tape, computers, etc
